text: Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata wa, arrā ga kudasa reta mono o shinji nasai.' To iwa reru to, kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi (yudayahito) wa, watashi-tachi ni kudasa reta mono o shinjiru.' To iu. Sore igai no mono wa, tatoe kare-ra ga shoji suru mono o kakushō suru shinride sae mo shinjinai. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gataga moshi shinjanaraba, naze izen arrā no yogen-sha-tachi o satsugai shita no ka
